channel.title: Squids
channel.description: So, me and Si force where on my private server and we built an underwater dome made of glass and the squids could still attack us? Can they get through glass or something?

item.title: Squids
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Cole1497:

What version are you using for your sever? If it’s before 1.2 I think ghost mobs are still active (mobs that you can’t see but still do damage).

It’s the latest.

Read full topic

item.title: Squids
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Sounds like lag to me

Makes mobs invisible some times. (not really, but it means you start losing hp before you see them)

Read full topic

item.title: Squids
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:13, topic:379493”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=475333.msg3476004#msg3476004 date=1295714410]

Si just fell into the water, and started loosing HP rapidly too.

It’s like theres something we’re not seeing when you go into the water, really weird.

I smell herobrine.

Have you tried restarting the server?

Yes,I restarted it.

That’s just weird, maybe there’s something wrong with how your underwater works.
Either way, those squids aren’t hostile, I just spawned a bunch of them near me and they did nothing
[/quote]

Maybe, I’ve planted 300 + TNT near both watersides now anyway, so I’ll see if it happens after that (Trying to change landscape).[/quote]
I smell hax.
Keep us informed

Read full topic

ooo da interwebz haz secret mobz

item.title: Squids
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:3, topic:379493”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=475333.msg3475886#msg3475886 date=1295706713]

So, me and Si force where on my private server and we built an underwater dome made of glass and the squids could still attack us? Can they get through glass or something?

…
Are squids even hostile
[/quote]

Well hell, something was attacking me and it looked like them. There was nothing else there. I was just loosing HP every time I went down there o.0

Squids where only thing.[/quote]
Well according to the minecraft wiki squids are not hostile.
Maybe another mob spawnt and you can’t see it!
But seriously, try restarting the server on Peaceful mode and then back again to w/e mode you were at.

Read full topic
